headline: Johnson And Johnson Cardiac Data Fuels Fresh Look At Valuation Upside
summary: Johnson & Johnson (NYSE:JNJ) presented pilot-phase data for its OMNYPULSE and VARIPULSE atrial fibrillation platforms at the 31st Annual AF Symposium. The company reported industry first safety and effectiveness outcomes for these pulsed field ablation technologies. The data suggest potential for redefining minimally invasive electrophysiology procedures in cardiac care. For you as an investor, this update sits inside Johnson & Johnson’s broader medical technology push, where cardiac care...
